scripts.build: gulp build:locales && gulp build:assets && gulp build:vendor && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:js
scripts.build:html: html-minifier -c .htmlminrc src/index.html > dist/index.html && html-minifier -c .htmlminrc src/status.html > dist/status.html && for file in src/shared/**/*.html; do  mkdir -p dist/shared/$(basename $(dirname $file)); html-minifier -c .htmlminrc $file > dist/shared/$(basename $(dirname $file))/$(basename $file); done
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:bundle && npm run build:js:minify
scripts.build:js:minify: uglifyjs tmp/index.js --in-source-map tmp/index.js.map -c -m --source-map-root tmp --source-map-url index.js.map --source-map dist/index.js.map -o dist/index.js
scripts.watch: gulp build:vendor && gulp build:assets && npm-run-all -p watch:*
